data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
The GameRanger Account Switcher is a program that allows you to have multiple accounts in the game client program called GameRanger.
The maker of this program is not affiliated with or endorsed by the maker of GameRanger (Scott Kevill).
Button icons made by Mark James (famfamfam.com).

data.name: textBox2.Text
data.value:
This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

data.name: textBox3.Text
data.value: This will delete all files associated with The GameRanger Account Switcher leaving only AccountSwitcher.exe for you to delete yourself. This includes any settings files for accounts that are logged out. Keep in mind that the account that is currently logged in will be the only account that you will be able to use with GameRanger. Also keep in mind that after the uninstallation, if you run this program again, the program will automaticly create the files it needs again.
